article: chinese and french ministers of culture issued a joint statement here on tuesday to express their views on a convention on cultural diversity , which is being drafted by the united nations educational , scientific and cultural organization -lrb- unesco -rrb- .
abstract: chinese french cultural ministers issue joint statement
